name: September 1st (Irene Li)
description:
CW: Mentioning/Discussion of suicide and death.

A visual novel made for Fall 2022 Game Studio I at NYU Game Center MFA. Featuring a young woman, who keeps having weird dreams in which she dies over and over and wakes up to a room she doesn't recognize at all.  

This is her day - the day of days, quite literally.  

Approximate playtime: 15min. Sound effects here and there so might be better with volume on. 

*The epigraph is taken from the opening paragraph of Albert Camus' The Myth of Sisyphus. The word missing from the sentence is, as you may have suspected, suicide.
